title: Ultrasound-Based Anatomy Practical Inquiry Project

context.prior_knowledge: Basic human anatomy knowledge and fundamental ultrasound device operation
context.additional_context: Ultrasound image analysis and discussions via smartphones for practice-based projects, with team-based inquiry activities focused on thoracic/abdominal anatomical structures

learning_goals: Students can accurately describe the three-dimensional positional relationships of major thoracic and abdominal organs using ultrasound imaging
Students can collaborate to analyze and organize ultrasound practical data for submission in A3 report format
Based on anatomical knowledge acquired during practicals, students can propose diagnostic reasoning processes for virtual patient cases

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
